The Oblitercons/Ramhorn:



Ramhorn raised his pistol, taking aim at Bumblebee from behind.  Getting 
ready to pull the trigger, he felt the ground start to shake and heard the 
"rumble" of a very large engine.  Turning around, he saw the trees and grass 
start to shake.  "What in the Matrix?"

Ramhorn gased as he saw a large red tank smash through the foilage, a large 
cannon in the middle pointing at him.  Dropping his pistol, his body not 
moving with fear, Ramhorn screamed in horror as a gust of flames shot from 
the cannon, engulfing him.

---

Pyro transformed to robot mode, Ramhorn lying on the ground badly charred.  
Pyro chuckled.  "Yes, yes, burn, burn, everything!"

A HUMVEE with two cannons on the side drove up, stopping, and transforming.  
Scavenger looked to Pyro.  "I missed all the fun..."
<Dark One, Pyro literally toasted a Maximal and...oooh, the fight.  I'm going 
in!>

A large artillery cannon with four wheels rolled up, transforming into a 
robot.  "Excellent." Breakdown chuckled.

A black space fighter flew overhead, transforming in mid air and landing on 
the ground.  "Perfect." Dark One said with a smile.

Hiss walked up.  "Shall I go to my gun mode?"

"Not yet." Dark One replied.  "Let us all transform and engage the Maximals 
further." he said, everyone transforming and beginning to advance on the 
battle.
